title: Does swallowing the water that remains in the nose during Wudu make the prayer invalid? Assim AlHake
transcript: secondly she says that if a person blows pulls water up his nostrils and blows the water out and some water remains mixed with the uh mucus and during salat he swallows it would that invalidate his salad there's no problem in that insha allah it's not the best thing to do it's not healthy but it does not invalidate your salat and allah azza knows better you
